overview: Graduated from the USA Merchant Marine Academy, and served three years in the US Navy as lieutenant .Received Chief engineering license at the age of twenty six due to the Vietnam war. Opened inter State Franchise in Baltimore Handle all consignment batteries and alternators. Purchase many cores from two hundred gas station in Baltimore.1976 Co founder Precision Alternators and starters in Fairfax Virginia. 1984 founded Precision Bearing (Hongkong) 1987 founded Precision Automatic Industries 1997 Delco Remy acquired Precision Automotive and starters for over $44million
